Description: The provided function parseuid only converts a user identifier string into a uid_t using getpwnam or numeric parsing. It does not perform any privileged action, authorization decision, or access to protected resources; it merely returns a UID value based on input. As such, there is no access control policy to enforce within this helper, and no CWE-284 improper access control can be identified from this code alone. Whether the caller later misuses the returned UID is outside the scope of this function.
